content: I've just added this: http://build.fhir.org/languages.html. comments are welcome

That is great, thank you! My only comment would be from an earlier ticket around using the word "localization" so Google picks it up: https://gforge.hl7.org/gf/project/fhir/tracker/?action=TrackerItemEdit&tracker_id=677&tracker_item_id=12457
Nice! Thanks for bringing those hidden gems together. The page might be more obvious as internationalization.html or multi-lingual-support.html
